text: Yadi kono straiye ta'ira sbamira durbyarahara athaba upeksara asanka karae tente sihamta ubhaye apoca-nispatti karaiba bicaraile sihamtara kono gunaha na'i; arau apoca-nispatti karaatorae'i sraeya. Manuhara antarata lobhaniya krpanata ache. Yadi tomaloke satkarmaparaayana horaa arau muttakbi horaa, tente tomaloke yi karaa se'i samparke allaheto jane'i
